description: This file declares an abstract interface (IController) for controlling processes or modules within the WPEFramework PluginHost component. It contains method definitions for persisting state, deleting resources, rebooting, retrieving environment variables, configuring modules, and cloning configurations.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An abstract interface for controlling and managing plugin modules, including persistence, deletion, reboot, environment retrieval, configuration management, and cloning.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persists or saves the current state of the module or plugin.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a resource located at the specified path.

methods.name: Reboot
methods.description: Reboots the system or plugin environment.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves environment variables associated with a given index.

methods.name: Configuration
methods.description: Retrieves or sets the configuration associated with a specific callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a copy of a configuration or callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
